scripts.lazyboy: cd demo && tns prepare android && tns build android && cd ..
scripts.demo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numberpicker && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numberpicker && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
